article_title: What next as Ireland recognises Palestinian state?
sentence: Former  Irish  justice  minister  Alan  Shatter,  who  is  Jewish,  said  there  had  been  a  "continuing  escalation  of  anti-semitism"  in  Ireland  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  attacked  Israel  and  killed  about  1,200  people.
